titleStmt.title: A defence of the Kings authority and supremacy in the church & church-discipline and that he is supream head and governour over all persons, in all causes ecclesiastical : against these disciplinarians, the Pope and his clergy, the bishops and episcoparians, the Scottish and English Presbyterians, with the independents ... / by Theophilus Brabourne.
titleStmt.author: Brabourne, Theophilus, b. 1590.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold by William Nowell,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
